javadoc:
Event for telling a tool (program mgr) to open a program

This event shares a common tool-event name with the {@link OpenProgramPluginEvent} so that they have a single shared tool connection.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: source
params.comment: name of the plugin that created this event

params.name: p
params.comment: the program associated with this event

methods.javadoc:
Return the program on this event.
@return null if the event if for a program closing.
methods.name: getProgram
methods.comment: Return the program on this event.

return.comment: null if the event if for a program closing.

name: OpenProgramPluginEvent
comment:
Event for telling a tool (program mgr) to open a program
 
 This event shares a common tool-event name with the OpenProgramPluginEvent 
 so that they have a single shared tool connection.
